Weekly News

This page includes current announcements at First Baptist. This is the same information that is found in the weekly bulletin.

Study Gatherings

  • Early Sunday School: Sundays, 9:15 PM (Intergenerational Class)
  • Late Sunday School: Sundays, 10:15 AM (Bykota) & 10:45 AM (Two by Two, Friendship, and an Intergenerational Class)

Wednesday Evening Activities

Wednesday evenings are a time for various programs, rehearsals and a shared meal. Prayer Shawl (4:30), Meal (5:30), Children Program (6:00), Handbells, Bible Study, other special meetings (6:30) and Choir Rehearsal (7:40).

Community Lenten Services

You are encouraged to attend the community Lenten services at noon on Wednesdays at the Northside Church of God. The services will be 30 minutes and a meal is provided afterwards. The Good Friday service will be at St. Lawrence Catholic Church.

Children’s Church

Children's Church is during the Late Worship Gathering. Children's Church is for children in kindergarten through 2nd grade. The children are dismissed before the sermon to the basement classroom for their worship time. Jessica Fink & Kelly Richard are co-coordinating and teaching.

Life Group Leaders Meeting

Life Group leaders meet on the 1st and 3rd Wednesday evenings of each month. The Life Group leaders will meet this Wednesday, February 20 at 6:30 PM in the church office.

It is time to register for summer camp at Camp Tippy. Shirley Pittinger is organizing registration this year. You can pick up a registration form in the church office or download a form from http://camptippy.org. Dates are posting on the bulletin board in the lower hallway and at http://camptippy.org. If you're interested in registering for Camp, please contact Shirley at (765) 282-0632.

Missional Communities

A pilot missional community has started this month. The first large group Missional Community meeting was February 6 in the lower auditorium. We will meet again as a large group on February 19 at the Muncie Mission and on March 6 at the church. Participants have signed up for smaller groups, called life groups and will meet the second and fourth weeks of the month. On the third week of each month, a mission project will be organized for all participants of the missional community. Everyone is invited to join the group on the first and third week of each month. Monthly mission projects will be advertised in the bulletin.

Youth for Christ Spring Banquet

Join the Story

Thursday, March 14, 7-8 pm at Cornerstone Center for the Arts Muncie Area YFC (Youth for Christ) is hosting an annual banquet to share about what God is doing in this ministry. The Muncie Area YFC staff would like to share how you can be a part of what God is doing among youth in our communities. Seats are $5, and will include a dessert and coffee buffet. For questions or to RSVP contact Matt Headley, Muncie Central High School Ministry Director, 765-405-0536 or matt@fbcmuncie.org

Church Website

We have updated the website to a new format for use on mobile devices. Please check it out and let us know what you think and if anything needs to be added to the site.

Tithes and Offerings

2013 has shown similar levels of giving to 2012. This past month, our income was only 79% of expenses. We are taking steps toward a balanced budget in this calendar year. We hope that everyone will prayerfully consider your tithes and offerings as an act of worship.

Financial Reports

Financial Reports and CCT Meeting Summaries are available in the church office on the receptionist's desk.

Muncie Mission Service Night

On the third week of each month, we will have a service project for the pilot missional community. This month, we will be working at the Muncie Mission. On Tuesday, February 19, we will be serving a meal and helping sort items at the mission. Please sign up for a slot or contact Debbie Gregg; debrajgregg@comcast.net, if you are willing to help.

Youth to Camp Barnabas

Youth interested in serving at Camp Barnabas this summer should contact Wade. A group from First Baptist will be serving July 5-12. Space is limited; you should sign up ASAP.
